title: Congregational Day at Spring Mill Bible Camp
description:
_Friday & Saturday, May 3rd and 4th_

Dinner for Friday evening, May 3 will be at the dining room of the Spring Mill State Park Inn. Plan to meet at the Inn between 6:00-6:30 p.m. with a buffet dinner beginning at 6:30 p.m.

Group accommodations for Friday night will be at the facilities of the Spring Mill Bible Camp. You will need to bring your own bedding, towels and washcloths. The cabins are heated.

Breakfast will be provided Saturday morning.

Congregational activities will begin around 11:00 a.m., Saturday, May 4 and will include singing, devotionals and family activities around the Bible Camp

Please come for all or as many of the activities as possible
